description: Create a new project cost classification.
permissions: Allowed for admins, broker manager members of the classification broker, customer managers under that broker, manager laborers for job production plans under that broker customer organizations, laborers who can manage projects under that broker customer organizations, or planners or project managers for job production plans under that broker customer organizations.
side_effects: Creates a project cost classification and associates it to the specified broker and optional parent.
validation_notes: --name is required and must be unique within the same broker and parent. --broker is required. If --parent is provided, broker must be present and match the parent broker.
